SETPROMOTION_SEARCH_WHERE.Statement: WHERE w2_SetPromotion.setpromotion_id LIKE @setpromotion_id_like_escaped + '%' ESCAPE '#' AND ( w2_SetPromotion.setpromotion_name LIKE '%' + @setpromotion_name_like_escaped + '%' ESCAPE '#' OR w2_SetPromotion.setpromotion_disp_name LIKE '%' + @setpromotion_name_like_escaped + '%' ESCAPE '#' OR w2_SetPromotion.setpromotion_disp_name_mobile LIKE '%' + @setpromotion_name_like_escaped + '%' ESCAPE '#' ) AND ( @product_id_like_escaped = '' OR ( w2_SetPromotion.setpromotion_id IN ( SELECT w2_SetPromotionItem.setpromotion_id FROM w2_SetPromotionItem WHERE ( ( w2_SetPromotionItem.setpromotion_item_kbn = 'PRODUCT' OR w2_SetPromotionItem.setpromotion_item_kbn = 'VARIATION' ) AND NCHAR(13) + NCHAR(10) + w2_SetPromotionItem.setpromotion_items LIKE '%' + NCHAR(13) + NCHAR(10) + @product_id_like_escaped + '%' ESCAPE '#' ) GROUP BY w2_SetPromotionItem.setpromotion_id ) ) ) AND ( @category_id_like_escaped = '' OR ( w2_SetPromotion.setpromotion_id IN ( SELECT w2_SetPromotionItem.setpromotion_id FROM w2_SetPromotionItem WHERE ( w2_SetPromotionItem.setpromotion_item_kbn = 'CATEGORY' AND NCHAR(13) + NCHAR(10) + w2_SetPromotionItem.setpromotion_items LIKE '%' + NCHAR(13) + NCHAR(10) + @category_id_like_escaped + '%' ESCAPE '#' ) GROUP BY w2_SetPromotionItem.setpromotion_id ) ) ) AND ( @status = '' OR ( @status = '0' AND w2_SetPromotion.begin_date > GETDATE() ) OR ( @status = '1' AND w2_SetPromotion.valid_flg = '1' AND w2_SetPromotion.begin_date <= GETDATE() AND ( w2_SetPromotion.end_date >= GETDATE() OR w2_SetPromotion.end_date IS NULL ) ) OR ( @status = '2' AND w2_SetPromotion.valid_flg = '0' AND w2_SetPromotion.begin_date <= GETDATE() AND ( w2_SetPromotion.end_date >= GETDATE() OR w2_SetPromotion.end_date IS NULL ) ) OR ( @status = '3' AND w2_SetPromotion.end_date < GETDATE() ) ) AND ( @begin_date_from IS NULL OR w2_SetPromotion.begin_date >= @begin_date_from ) AND ( @begin_date_to IS NULL OR w2_SetPromotion.begin_date < DATEADD(day, 1, @begin_date_to) ) AND ( @end_date_from IS NULL OR w2_SetPromotion.end_date >= @end_date_from ) AND ( @end_date_to IS NULL OR w2_SetPromotion.end_date < DATEADD(day, 1, @end_date_to) )

SETPROMOTION_SEARCH_ORDER_BY.Statement: ORDER BY CASE @sort_kbn WHEN '0' THEN CASE WHEN ( w2_SetPromotion.begin_date > GETDATE() ) THEN '0' -- 準備中 WHEN ( w2_SetPromotion.valid_flg = '1' AND w2_SetPromotion.begin_date <= GETDATE() AND ( w2_SetPromotion.end_date >= GETDATE() OR w2_SetPromotion.end_date IS NULL ) ) THEN '1' -- 開催中 WHEN ( w2_SetPromotion.valid_flg = '0' AND w2_SetPromotion.begin_date <= GETDATE() AND ( w2_SetPromotion.end_date >= GETDATE() OR w2_SetPromotion.end_date IS NULL ) ) THEN '2' -- 一時停止 WHEN ( w2_SetPromotion.end_date < GETDATE() ) THEN '3' -- 終了 END WHEN '1' THEN w2_SetPromotion.setpromotion_id WHEN '3' THEN w2_SetPromotion.setpromotion_name ELSE '1' END ASC, CASE @sort_kbn WHEN '2' THEN w2_SetPromotion.setpromotion_id WHEN '4' THEN w2_SetPromotion.setpromotion_name ELSE '1' END DESC, CASE @sort_kbn WHEN '5' THEN w2_SetPromotion.begin_date WHEN '7' THEN ISNULL(w2_SetPromotion.end_date, '9999/12/31') ELSE NULL END ASC, CASE @sort_kbn WHEN '6' THEN w2_SetPromotion.begin_date WHEN '8' THEN w2_SetPromotion.end_date ELSE NULL END DESC, w2_SetPromotion.setpromotion_id ASC
